data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Sicily, Italy a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sicily, Italy

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Sicily, Italy to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 4,969,541 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sicily, Italy. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Sicily a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Sicily who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Sicily.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 73,459 believers in Sicily and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

location.name: Sicily
